content: accessorize with this cute crochet neckerchief that adds a bold pop of color to your outfit stitched in machine wash and dry bernat softee cotton the fabric is warm and so soft to the touch practice single_crochet crochet 2 together decreases and more on this great first accessory project measuring 23 long style it any way you like for the perfect look make a selection in different colors for a no-fuss gift idea materials bernat® softee cotton™ 4 2 oz/120 g 254 yds/232 m fuchsia 69023 1 ball or 125 yds/114 m measurements approx 23 58 5 cm long x 3 7 5 cm wide
